summary.p: The Concatenation operator scans multiple inputs, returning each row scanned. Concatenation is typically used to implement UNION ALL.

The Concatenation physical operator has two or more inputs and one output. Concatenation copies tuples from the first input stream to the output stream, then repeats this operation for each additional input stream.
Concatenation is a logical and physical operator.

tr.td: Specifies set of columns united by the Concatenation operator.
